devdoc.author: Aave
devdoc.details: Based heavily on the EIP3156 reference implementation

params.addressesProvider: The address of the Aave PoolAddressesProvider
params.fee: The percentage of the flash-mint amount that needs to be repaid, on top of the principal (in bps)
params.ghoToken: The address of the GHO token contract
params.ghoTreasury: The address of the GHO treasury

flashFee(address,uint256).details: The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

params.data: Arbitrary data structure, intended to contain user-defined parameters.
params.receiver: The receiver of the tokens in the loan, and the receiver of the callback.

returns._0: The percentage fee of the flash-minted amount that needs to be repaid, on top of the principal (in bps).
The address of the GhoTreasury contract

maxFlashLoan(address).details: The amount of currency available to be lended.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

updateFee(uint256).details: The fee is expressed in bps. A value of 100, results in 1.00%

updateGhoTreasury(address).details: WARNING: The GhoTreasury is where revenue fees are sent to. Update carefully

CALLBACK_SUCCESS.return: The required callback, the keccak256 hash of 'ERC3156FlashBorrower.onFlashLoan'

returns._0: The required callback, the keccak256 hash of 'ERC3156FlashBorrower.onFlashLoan'

MAX_FEE.return: The maximum percentage fee of the flash-minted amount that the flashFee can be set to (in bps).

returns._0: The maximum percentage fee of the flash-minted amount that the flashFee can be set to (in bps).

devdoc.title: GhoFlashMinter

ADDRESSES_PROVIDER().notice: Returns the address of the Aave Pool Addresses Provider contract

CALLBACK_SUCCESS().notice: Returns the required return value for a successful flashmint

GHO_TOKEN().notice: Returns the address of the GHO token contract

MAX_FEE().notice: Returns the maximum value the fee can be set to

getFee().notice: Returns the percentage of each flash mint taken as a fee

getGhoTreasury().notice: Returns the address of the Gho Treasury

updateFee(uint256).notice: Updates the percentage fee. It is the percentage of the flash-minted amount that needs to be repaid.

updateGhoTreasury(address).notice: Updates the address of the Gho Treasury

userdoc.notice: Contract that enables FlashMinting of GHO.
